# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (41.0, -82.0) with fuel, source, and result.

### Lab at position (43.5, -81.5)
Consists of a lab at position (43.5, -81.5) with a science pack inserted.

### Power pole at position (43.5, -79.5)
Consists of a small electric pole at position (43.5, -79.5) connected to the lab.

### Power pole at position (44.5, -79.5)
Consists of a small electric pole at position (44.5, -79.5) connected to the lab.

### Steam engine at position (40.5, -79.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position (40.5, -79.5) connected to the lab.

### Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5) with a fluid box containing water.

### Pipe groups
Consists of multiple pipe groups at various positions, including:
- PipeGroup at position (17.5, 1.5) with 50 pipes
- PipeGroup at position (8.5, 5.5) with 32 pipes
- PipeGroup at position (-3.5, 13.5) with 14 pipes
- PipeGroup at position (-14.5, 15.5) with 16 pipes
- PipeGroup at position (-11.5, 15.5) with 9 pipes
- PipeGroup at position (-9.5, 21.5) with 1 pipe
- PipeGroup at position (5.5, 21.5) with 16 pipes
- PipeGroup at position (-8.5, 23.5) with 4 pipes and water fluid
- PipeGroup at position (-5.5, 22.5) with 1 pipe

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure the entity contains the item you are trying to extract.
- Make sure the entity is in a valid state before attempting to extract items.
- Ensure you can find a valid entity containing the item you are trying to extract.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you have the required item in your inventory before attempting to place an entity.
- Make sure the tile where you want to place the entity is not occupied by another entity.
- Ensure you are close enough to the target position to place the entity.
- Ensure the entity you are trying to place is not too far away from your current position.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure you have the required item in your inventory before attempting to connect entities.
- Make sure the entities you are trying to connect are compatible.

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure you have the required ingredients and recipes unlocked before attempting to craft an item.
- Make sure you have a crafting machine or smelting furnace available for items that require it.
- Ensure you have the required sub-ingredients before attempting to craft an item.
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients to craft the item.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure the furnace is not already full before attempting to insert items.
- Ensure the furnace does not already contain an item that cannot be inserted with the new item.
- Ensure the item you are trying to insert is compatible with the furnace.

### Errors when crafting pipes
- Ensure you have the required sub-ingredients (iron-plate) before attempting to craft a pipe.
- Make sure you have a crafting machine or smelting furnace available for items that require it.

### Errors when researching technologies
- Ensure you have the required ingredients and science packs before attempting to research a technology.
- Make sure you have the necessary prerequisites unlocked before attempting to research a technology.

### Errors when placing pipes
- Ensure the target position is not occupied by another entity.
- Ensure you are close enough to the target position to place the pipe.
- Ensure the pipe can be placed at the target location without any obstacles.

### Errors when picking up entities
- Ensure the entity exists at the target position before attempting to pick it up.
- Ensure the entity is not already being used or occupied by another process. 

### Errors when using insert_item function
- Ensure the second argument is an Entity or EntityGroup, not a Position.
